name: Bicycle girl
description:
Super difficult! Beyond the failure by bicycle in Aim the goal!

Free bike games bicycle girl go!

[Game Overview]

It is a game that leads the girl to go by bicycle to the goal.

The rear wheels move is touch the left half of the screen,the front wheels move is touch the right half of the screen.

When the girl is flying, touch the left half of the screen is left rotation, touch the right half of the screen is right rotation

(It will affect the rotation and inertia is working strongly.)

When you do not do any touch,the girl is slowly retreat.

Please aim to safely goal by taking advantage of the characteristics of the wheels and rotating operation.

It will become more and more difficult with each passing stage.

This game Will be very difficult to final

Please do its best to aim all the stages clear!

[Note]

· In order to carry out the display and optimization of advertising, you can connect to the network.

· In order to image attached to the time of tweet, it requires the permission of storage access.
